Title: Regularly Scheduled Maintenance
Description:
I've got another problem that's a bit more... personal, $p.

My girlfriend, Aemyra, is a Lamplighter. I thought she'd be back from her last mission, to Velhan's Claim, by now.

Could you go make sure she's okay, and deliver this message? I'm worried to the point of distraction.

Maybe you could also pick some of her favorite flowers, up that hill? 

I'd go myself, but if I can get ELIZA working right, it would do so much to feed people in Hallowfall. And give me more time to spend with Aemyra, too!
ObjectivesText: Take Orren's Message, 6 Crimson Charmer and 1 Amber Bloom to Aemyra at Velhan's Claim.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Bring Orren's message to Aemyra at Velhan's Claim.
CompletionText: These are from Orren? I think they go well together, even though they're so different.
RewardText:
Wow, that's really sweet of him. I'll be here for a while, dealing with the kobyss, but I should send something back. 

So he knows I'm safe, and that I can't wait to see him.
